preqs: Level 1 of BRadMedImag course, RAD2051 and RAD2061.

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 5 (I/W) units in {RAD1021, RAD1031, RAD1061, RAD2051, RAD2061} OR  Must have passed 5 (I/W) units in {RAD1011, RAD1021, RAD1031, RAD1041, RAD1051})
Must be enrolled in course version {1963, 4526, M3006}

description: The unit develops a student's existing knowledge of digital imaging systems, evidence based practice and research principles required for practice within the healthcare workforce of the future. The unit includes digital image processing applied to medical imaging, patient care requirements for diagnostic imaging examinations including those using contrast media, evidence based practice in diagnostic imaging and the evaluation and application of research in diagnostic imaging.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
